116131020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Machina card (excluding Ironglider Elf) from your deck into your hand.
116131020.evoFlair_:
The forest dwellers increased their firepower with machinery. However, this conflicted with the old ways, so they made a decision: to embrace change, to cull those who still obeyed the land.
—On Flourishing, Part 3

117131010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Fighter.
(Can only Accelerate if a follower was played this turn.)
----------
Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, summon a Fighter and evolve it.
117131010.baseFlair_: Follow the Six of Swords, navigator of prospect. She ensures a new tomorrow for those who have overcome today. With her at the helm, the memories you make will help you on your way.
117131010.evoFlair_: When the forest seems inescapable, reach out and take her hand. She ferries trailblazers on her boat pulled by fairies. Service with a smile: that's the motto of an elf who's always looking toward the future.

107141010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Fairy Wisp into your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Put Fairies into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)
107141010.baseFlair_: I feel it in the very wind brushing my cheeks—the premonition of battle. If violence is the answer, you've left me no choice. Fairies, gather by my side... today, we glide upon new winds!
107141010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Fairy Wisp into your hand.
107141010.evoFlair_: Luminous sky, sacred trees, and azure ocean—nature grants us life. If you intend to defile it, prepare to answer to my sword. Fairies, gather by my side... I will become one with the wind!

704141010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Fairy Wisp into your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Put Fairies into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)
704141010.baseFlair_: I feel it in the very wind brushing my cheeks—the premonition of battle. If violence is the answer, you've left me no choice. Fairies, gather by my side... today, we glide upon new winds!
704141010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Fairy Wisp into your hand.
704141010.evoFlair_: Luminous sky, sacred trees, and azure ocean—nature grants us life. If you intend to defile it, prepare to answer to my sword. Fairies, gather by my side... I will become one with the wind!

111141010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Draw a card. Put a Carbuncle's Sparkle into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Put 4 Carbuncle's Sparkles into your deck.
111141010.baseFlair_:
Sheened in morning dew, the jewel of the forest glistens on its forehead. Nothing can crack that faceted gem. Its radiance penetrates to the very depths of the forest.
— On Carbuncles, Cryptid Companion
111141010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Recover 2 play points.
111141010.evoFlair_:
The jewel of the forest gleams on its forehead, resonating with the evening dew. The creature returns without fail, across the millennia, its eternal brilliance illuminating the forest.
—On Carbuncles, Cryptid Companion

900141010.baseFlair_: Heed my warning, trespasser. We have no mercy for those who threaten the princess.
900141010.evoFlair_: If you turn back now, I can promise your safety. If you draw your blade, I can only promise an icy grave.

101114030.baseEffect_: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
101114030.baseFlair_: Well, sure, you could call it organized robbery, but why put such a negative spin on things?

117114010.baseEffect_:
Summon 4 Fairies and give them Rush.
Enhance (8): Evolve them instead.
117114010.baseFlair_: It's called Area Fairy One. Even the most experienced elves steer clear of that place. Because once you go in, you never come out.

108124010.baseEffect_: Transform an enemy follower into a Fairy. Put a Fairy into your hand.
108124010.baseFlair_: "Where am I? I can't take any more of being lost!" The trekker's anguished cry elected a giggle from the fairies. "Don't worry! We'll make sure you never get lost again! We'll make you one of us!"

113124010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Put a Fairy into your hand.
113124010.baseFlair_: Even the worst ne'er-do-well plays a role in the forest. —Dryad

109134010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 4 times.
Enhance (10): Deal damage to the enemy leader instead. Deal damage 1 more time for every 2 allied Fairies that have been destroyed this match.
109134010.baseFlair_: At first glance it may seem like a snare, but these threads pierce to kill. —Elven Archer

101122010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, draw a card if at least 3 cards have been played this turn.
101122010.baseFlair_: Let us give thanks for this bountiful harvest.

116123010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Summon 2 Fairies.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Fairies.
116123010.baseFlair_: No matter how peculiar, there is always meaning behind the gods' mischief. Fayfolk, on the other hand...

104132010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a card, if there are no Fairies in your hand, put 1 into your hand.
104132010.baseFlair_: Fairies live much longer than us, and they're far more clever. So if you want to capture one, don't try to outsmart her. Just pique her curiosity. —Chapter 3, Fairy Hunters' Handbook

100111050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
100111050.baseFlair_: Called to action by the pleading of the pure-hearted, this creature prowls the forest. The prayers of forest dwellers swell its trunk, causing it to grow ever stronger.
100111050.evoFlair_: As the forest dwellers continue to pray, the creature grows ever stronger. Alas, when the praying stops, it turns into a wild and vengeful spirit.

101111080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 3 Fairies into your hand.
101111080.baseFlair_: Welcome back, pretty little pixie. How are things in the forest? Hm? More and more monsters on account of the miasma, eh? Something has to be done! And quickly!
101111080.evoFlair_: The forest's been cleansed of that evil miasma thanks to the pixies who live there. We should go and share the good news with the ones who evacuated!

102111060.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
102111060.baseFlair_: A forest guardian who yearns for peace and guides the forest denizens with a warm, gentle voice.
102111060.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
102111060.evoFlair_: A forest protector who cooperates with allies to drive away any threats to the forest and preserve the peace.

113111020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Clash: Give the enemy follower -2/-0.
113111020.baseFlair_: The tendrils are the maiden's locks; the branches, her limbs; the trunk, her tender skin. She is the alluring forest itself. None with impure hearts may ever hope to touch her.
113111020.evoFlair_: The thorns are the lady's nails; the leaves, her fingers; the blossoms, her smiles. She is the delicate forest itself. None with wicked hearts may ever hope to exit her.

116111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand. Then deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of Fairies in your hand.
116111010.baseFlair_: Wh-what? We're really going through with this? I didn't spend my time learning strategy so I could play simple pranks. Oooh, fine—but I'm going home after a practical joke or two.
116111010.evoFlair_:
"Yes, we've led them to the pitfall! Diversionary force, now's our chance! Attack!"
"Hehe, doesn't matter what you say, you love pranks! That's proof you're a fairy after all!"
—Fairy Officer and Her Subordinate

101121050.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
101121050.baseFlair_: My duty is to foretell the fate of this forest and to protect those within. Should danger threaten the forest dwellers, I shall guide us through.
101121050.evoFlair_: These eyes see what the future holds. That future, however, is ever changing. Shifting. Even if I see naught but strife and misery, I will never abandon hope.

103121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change an enemy follower's defense to 1.
103121020.baseFlair_: Bam! Direct hit... Hm? The enemy still seems to be moving. Evil shouldn't have stood a chance against my pegasus-mane bow!
103121020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
103121020.evoFlair_: No foe can survive an onslaught from a pegasus-mane bow. I won't miss again. Prepare to get pincushioned!

103121040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select a Forestcraft card in your hand that costs 4 play points or less and change its cost to 0.
103121040.baseFlair_: Well aren't you a pretty one? Now run right into my arms, as straight and unerring as a forest boar.
103121040.evoFlair_: Those who seek to harm the children of the woods will have no mercy from me. If I have to rage like a forest dragon to protect the animals, so be it.

109121020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
109121020.baseFlair_: Even for a withered forest, the promise of spring awaits. Until its arrival, I will stand here in its stead—a small price to pay for the mother tree that saved me.
109121020.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it withers, it will come back one day. Until that day arrives, I will stand here and await its return. I must do all I can to repay my debt to the mother tree.

110121010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put a Hornet Warrior or Hornet Sting into your hand.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put both into your hand instead.
110121010.baseFlair_: The cacophony of buzzing wings signals the coming of the forest's soldiers. Those who face them face a wall of needles. Those who flee them flee a barrage of poisonous strikes.
110121010.evoFlair_: "Yawn... Why is everything so dull? Go forth. Charm them with my nectar, sink them with the force of my nest..." —Bab'zz, Hornet Queen

111121010.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
111121010.baseFlair_:
"Ooh-ooh! Ah! Ooh-ooh-ooh-ahh! Ooh-aaaah!"
"He says he can't tell whether we're trouble, so we should get out of his woods."
—Forest Defender with a novice interpreter
111121010.evoFlair_:
"Ooh-ooh! Ah! Ooh-ooh-ooh-ahh! Ooh-aaaah!"
"He says the weather looks like trouble, so we'd better get out of the woods."
—Forest Defender with a veteran interpreter

112121020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Summon a Nature's Warden. Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
112121020.baseFlair_: Intruders! Get 'em! I can't believe you idiots would still dare to contaminate nature with your presence! We'll band together like never before and teach you to never come back!
112121020.evoFlair_: Water is but another part of Mother Nature's kingdom! And we are a part of her will and fervor! Don't let your guard down, intruder—we're always watching!

117121010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random follower with Accelerate from your deck into your hand.
Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
117121010.baseFlair_: Welcome the Six of Wands, purveyor of encouragement. If your confidence is shattered, he will put back the pieces. Let his words bolster your self-worth and push you toward greater goals.
117121010.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
117121010.evoFlair_: He is a critic, an acclaimer of beasts. Around him, stomping hooves, fluttering wings—even neighs turn to yays. Praise the forest, and it will praise you back.

101131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the defense of all enemy followers to 1 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
101131030.baseFlair_: The eternal mother of all fairies. She uses the wisdom she has gleaned over the course of her long life to act as the leader of the forest. She hates conflict, enjoys order, and has long been a force for peace and stability.
101131030.evoFlair_: This noble fairy is a calm and impartial judge in all matters. She brings justice to bear on those who seek to cause conflict and drives away those who disturb the social order.

101131050.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, deal 1 damage to it.
101131050.baseFlair_: A heroic figure who has come to the forest from a white-walled castle in order to act as a source of strength for the people. Robin Hood does not hesitate to fire an arrow or two at those who dare intrude in the forest.
101131050.evoEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, deal 1 damage to it.
101131050.evoFlair_: Master of the forest, defender of the weak, principled thief—Robin Hood is all things to all men. Proud and passionate, this outlaw will not put down the bow while the flames of the struggle continue to blaze within.

103131020.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it Rush.
103131020.baseFlair_: The light of life fades away, but the light of gems never will. Isn't it clear which is superior? Loyal subjects! Guard the eternal light!
103131020.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it Rush.
103131020.evoFlair_: The light of life fades away, but the light of gems never will. For the immortal elf, there's no better friend. Now go defend the gems at all costs!

104131030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Summon a Jungle Warden. Then give all allied Jungle Wardens Storm.
104131030.baseFlair_: Outta the jungle, intruders! Or ignore my warning and face the wrath of me and my friends!
104131030.evoFlair_: Cry out! Roar, my friends! We are the jungle's heart, and we its wardens. We will not spare a single intruder!

106131010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Harvest Festival into your hand and change its cost to 0.
106131010.baseFlair_: Sage or sap, lofty or lowly, everyone is equal before love. So let us begin the banquet of love.
106131010.evoFlair_: You who draw near with love, you who draw away with love, love will enrich your heart. Now show me your love.

108131020.baseEffect_: When you play another follower, give it Storm, then return this follower to your hand.
108131020.baseFlair_: The instant I mounted, the forest wolf transformed into a frightening gust of wind. Clinging on for dear life, I screamed like a child and prayed to god for the very first time. —Chapter 4, Sylvan Expeditions
108131020.evoFlair_: Tearing through the trees and bounding off across cliffs, it delivered me to the other side of the forest and immediately vanished without a trace. Suffice it to say, I should prefer to ride on horseback next time. —Chapter 5, Sylvan Expeditions

110131020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put a spell that costs 1 play point or less from your deck into your hand.
At the end of your turn, restore defense to your leader equal to the number of enemy followers in play.
110131020.baseFlair_: We must never kill, for there is merit in preserving even the smallest life. Let go and allow life to run its course in both growth and decay.
110131020.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore defense to your leader equal to the number of enemy followers in play.
110131020.evoFlair_:
The Third Law: Continuation
Survival and association, these are the ways of the world. Allow all beings their due persistence.
—Teachings of the Unkilling Guardian

111131010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, if an allied follower was destroyed this turn, put a Righteous Evocation into your hand.
111131010.baseFlair_: I made a vow, as a leader of the Order of Bladerights, to support my comrades and protect the country. So failing to do my duty is not an option.
111131010.evoFlair_: I made a vow to be an upright warrior and never to bring shame on my guild or tarnish its vision of justice. So I have to stop you. I'll settle this with my own two hands.

116131010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover 4 play points.
Whenever you play a card, if it's the fifth card or later played this turn, draw a card.
116131010.baseFlair_: Walking through the forest, sunlight peeks through the treetops and petals dance along the breeze. A smiling girl appears before you. When you meet her gaze, the breeze picks up into a gentle wind, beckoning you forth. Dare you follow this fairy's caress?
116131010.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a card, if it's the fifth card or later played this turn, draw a card.
116131010.evoFlair_: Continuing through the forest, the aroma of flowers fills the air and the leaves begin a graceful descent to the ground. The girl grins and begins a whimsical dance. Wind envelops you, an invitation to join. Dare you surrender to the whims of the fay?

102141010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Crystalia Eve. Give it Ward and evolve it if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
102141010.baseFlair_: Deep within a castle encased in ice resides the princess of crystals. There, between the worlds of gods and men, she watches over the ice crystals' shine.
102141010.evoFlair_: Long lived is the princess of crystals, her every memory forever captured in a crystal of ice.

109141010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, put a Fil into your hand. Put 2 Fils into your hand instead if at least 4 damage was dealt to your leader during the opponent's previous turn. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Put 3 Fils into your hand, and recover 3 play points.
109141010.baseFlair_: Haha... Look at him try to ask her out for coffee. Cute. Someone should tell him old-fashioned flirting doesn't work anymore. A true gentleman has a certain je ne sais quoi to his approach. But, ugh, he's hopeless!
109141010.evoFlair_: I want everyone—absolutely everyone—who wears one of my dresses to find happiness. I mean, why would you wear something if it doesn't help you find your own happy ending?

109141020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn. Then deal 2 damage to all enemy followers if at least 4 other cards were played this turn.
109141020.baseFlair_: You've held your ground well. However, your efforts are in vain. From the moment I caught you in my sight, your heart sounded its last moments.
109141020.evoFlair_: Gods, demons, mankind—it matters not. All will be obliterated by my arrows.

114141020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Then, if you have a Fairy in your hand, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
114141020.baseFlair_:
"It's like... This place is home or whatever, so."
Forever aloof, forever chill...
"That's why I fight. You gotta protect your home, yeah?"
The Stoneclaw looks forward, prepared to do what must be done.
114141020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Send 'Em Packing into your hand.
114141020.evoFlair_:
"Lol. You pissed off the wrong girl, bro."
Claws as hard as granite, strike as strong as boulders...
"Say hi to the birds for me. Toodles."
The Stoneclaw metes out her own brand of justice, sending her foes packing.

101134010.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
101134010.baseFlair_: Go back to the ground from whence you came, evildoers.

101132010.baseEffect_: Can evolve an allied Fairy each turn for 0 evolution points.
101132010.baseFlair_: This is where our dazzling queen reigns. Where radiantly colored wings abound. Where eternal secrets sleep.

100111070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times.
100111070.baseFlair_: I won't let you get away! You're going to regret the mess you made in our home! You really think you can outrun these arrows? Ha!
100111070.evoFlair_: Prepare yourselves! Turn your back and your fate is sealed! Don't worry though. I won't let you suffer.

106111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
106111030.baseFlair_: This creature sleeps at the bottom of a marsh. When the cycle begins anew, it lets out a sharp cry. This cry is said to cut through the air and cause plentiful rainfall.
106111030.evoFlair_: This creature announces the coming of the rainy season. Its call is said to be the reverberating sound of thunder during heavy rain.

114111020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 for each Fairy in your hand.
114111020.baseFlair_:
If fairies are the eyes of the forest, elves are its arms. Fairies discover intruders and confound them until elves arrive to put an end to the incursion.
—Step into the Forest, Chapter 2
114111020.evoFlair_:
You might expect there to be friction between the carefree fairies and duty-bound elves—and you would be correct. This does not, however, impede their ability to collaborate.
—Step into the Forest, Chapter 3

100121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to all allied followers if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
100121010.baseFlair_: Well, of course, it began as just a teeny little chemical to help my dear plants grow. But the more I tinkered and toyed and experimented... Well, let's just say that now my dear plants grow however I want them to!
100121010.evoFlair_: With this gift for plants, I've got a duty to protect the forest dwellers! Now then, everyone, come drink this secret medicine! One drop and you'll be bursting with power!

101121060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Evolve if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
101121060.baseFlair_: The great, wise tree that serves as lord of the forest. It supports the trunks that creak beneath the weight of snow and encourages the shrubs that freeze in the frost.
101121060.evoFlair_: Once cruel winter passes, the buds of the new spring await. The king of the fairies' forest visits each spot anew, basking in the vigor of the new season.

101121070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
101121070.baseFlair_: A kindly beast dispatched by the Beast King to watch over the fairies. Its wings are said to heal the injured forest.
101121070.evoFlair_: Infused with the fairies' prayers of gratitude, the wings of the guardian glimmer brightly. It draws power from respect and trust, and with that strength it strikes down evil.

102121030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 for each other card in your hand.
102121030.baseFlair_: Once, long ago, the world was nothing but nature. But then the defilers came, armed with their infernal knowledge, and nature wilted before them.
102121030.evoFlair_: From the heart of the forest, the Master of the Canopies bellows his rage. He goes forth to annihilate the defilers, and to restore the world to its former pristine state.

105121030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers +1/+1 if you have at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand.
105121030.baseFlair_: A spirit of the great tree that watches over the forest. Its life force is bound to the woods through the earth's meridians. Animals love the tree, and forest guardians hold it dear.
105121030.evoFlair_: Forest guardians made offerings in appreciation of the woodlands' bounty. They helped the tree's soothing flowers to bloom and brought together the people in peace.

106121030.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
106121030.baseFlair_: It's a demon that lives in the depths of a gloomy forest. It uses its blade to shake the earth, removing any who would trespass in its territory.
106121030.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
106121030.evoFlair_: It's a demon that lives in the depths of a dying forest. Visit its home out of curiosity and you may find yourself cut down.

116121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 3 damage to the enemy leader.
116121020.baseFlair_:
I'm the strongest in the forest—every lad and lass depends on me! No matter yer problem, my trusty hatchets'll solve it!
"What's that, boy? A fallen tree! I'm on my way!"
116121020.evoFlair_:
I'm the elf everyone loves—and I like it that way! No matter yer problem, my trusty hatchets are always here to help!
"The weather might ruin your picnic? Not on my watch! I'm on my way!"

102131010.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower attacks, give it +1/+0.
102131010.baseFlair_: The woods must be protected. I am both the sword and shield of the king, and it is in his name that I now act.
102131010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 2 Fairies.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, give it +1/+0.
102131010.evoFlair_: Hear me, dryads, for you are the swords and shields of our king as well. May your shimmering wings light the path to victory!

102131020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn. If that follower has 3 attack or less, return it to the opponent's hand instead.
102131020.baseFlair_: It's nothin' personal. I'm just doin' my job. Now hold still.
102131020.evoFlair_: My arrow's aimed right at you, so you're as good as dead.

103131030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemies if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
103131030.baseFlair_: A lion-headed god of war, Maahes crushes all invaders who dare to step foot within the sacred realm. With each ruthless swing, the rampaging lion cuts evil in two.
103131030.evoFlair_: The lion god's fearsome attacks against the fiendish army were unceasing. The battle raged throughout the day and into the night as the great lion exterminated his foes, solidifying his legacy.

104131020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Recover 1 evolution point.
104131020.baseFlair_: The Crystal Palace is our home, the only place we belong. Visitors aren't welcome here, especially ones who would defile our home.
104131020.evoFlair_: You seem to be interested in us, but I have no interest in you. So why not do us both a favor and leave? If you don't, you'll see just how much colder our reception can get.

107131020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers +1/+0. Give all other allied followers Rush if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
107131020.baseFlair_: You're all still so young, so fragile. So please, fall back and leave it to me. I'll take care of this, even if it means getting my hands dirty!
107131020.evoFlair_: Through the root of a single tree, the Dark defiled our forest. It's too late to save it—too late to heal it. That is why I must fight! In the name of the mother forest, and mother nature!

101141010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Fairies into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)
101141010.baseFlair_: This is the garden of the fairies, a peaceful place for the pure at heart. You were led here by the twinkling lights, weren't you? Is your conscience clear enough to let you in?
101141010.evoFlair_: Here, don't you see? The glimmer of the moon, the trees—look, even the fairies themselves bless you. Come now, won't you dance with me beneath this radiant moonlight?

105141010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if you have at least 5 other cards in your hand. Gain the following effects if there are at least 3 other neutral cards in your hand - Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
105141010.baseFlair_: A statuesque princess and a ferocious warrior. One half of this unlikely pair is a beauty; the other is a beast. Drawn together by their beautiful hearts, the two have created a bond that transcends love.
105141010.evoFlair_: These two share a bond of pure love. Though their forms may differ, their hearts and their affections are equally sincere. They feel no shame when proclaiming their love to the world.

106141010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
106141010.baseFlair_: My beautiful figure is unrivaled—praise it! No matter how brightly the stars shine, they pale before me.
106141010.evoFlair_: My beauty—my very light—is the greatest glory covering the heavens. Come on, you surface dwellers! Have every word of adulation at your disposal for me!

706141010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
706141010.baseFlair_: My beautiful figure is unrivaled—praise it! No matter how brightly the stars shine, they pale before me.
706141010.evoFlair_: My beauty—my very light—is the greatest glory covering the heavens. Come on, you surface dwellers! Have every word of adulation at your disposal for me!

108141010.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Fanfare: Choose - Put a Blessings of Creation or Wrath of Nature into your hand.
108141010.baseFlair_: The first greenery to germinate in the world. Her limitless mercy comforts all creation, and her hidden might makes all nature tremble.
108141010.evoFlair_: The mother of life, the source of providence. Her infinite love spreads across the continent like the greenery. And if the world's path should ever be in err, that love shall turn to wrath and cover the world like greenery.

108141020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
If this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect during your turn, evolve this follower.
108141020.baseFlair_: The white primate's eyes dart to the right, dart to the left. Young though it is, this forest warrior is intent on defending its verdant cradle.
108141020.evoFlair_: The mantle of reason is cast off and that of animality done on. Cutting down the enemy vanguard—crying out—is the white primate. Its two tremendous fists, imbued with nature's wrath, power it onward.

108141030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if at least 3 cards were played this turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
108141030.baseFlair_:
The one shall alight in a land of great verdancy. Bearing an axe clad in sage cyclones, he will color the land in shades of green. He is the long-awaited vessel of unadorned nature. —
Book of Prophecies, Nature Scrolls
108141030.evoFlair_: The one shall dispel the realm of demons who oppose nature. The one is our hope, the power of the forest. Our future is entrusted there in the axe that he wields. —Book of Prophecies, Nature Scrolls

111141020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if at least 4 cards were played this turn, double all other allied followers' attack and defense, then remove this effect.
111141020.baseFlair_: I once lost myself in these woods and wandered, watering the trees with my tears. But now I have so many friends. That's why I became the forest oracle. Let my dance buoy you up. Then give whoever bothers us a lesson they won't soon forget!
111141020.evoFlair_: I am the kindhearted forest oracle. Even if you trespass against me, I won't take your life. I'll smack you around, make you cry, and let everyone laugh themselves sick at your expense... but I'll let you off with that.

112141010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give another unevolved allied Forestcraft follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon 2 Fairy Wisps.
112141010.baseFlair_: Forest folk, can you hear me? On our new queen's honor, the time has come for us to raise our swords once again. We shall bring victory to this forest!
112141010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 2 Fairies.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon 2 Fairy Wisps.
112141010.evoFlair_:
"Cynthia became a knight just for me!"
—Liza, Queen of the Forest
"She's a bit of a stick-in-the-mud, but her heart's in the right place."
—Marion, Fierce Dragonewt

117141020.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Forestcraft followers that originally cost 2 play points or more
Whenever 2 or more cards are fused to this card at once, gain +2/+0 and draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: If at least 2 cards are fused to this card, gain Storm. Then, if at least 4 cards are fused to this card, destroy an enemy follower.
117141020.baseFlair_:
It's a walking guillotine, for lack of a better name. Nothing is safe from its blades. Not trees, not the earth, and of course, not necks. The condemned have only to wait their turn.
—Waiting for the End, Preface
117141020.evoFlair_:
Watch how the blades dance through the air. The first slash slices in two, and the second dices indiscriminately. Take a seat. Tremble while you still can. The execution is about to begin.
—Waiting for the End, Epilogue

103111060.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
103111060.baseFlair_: The needs of the forest dwellers can't very well be ignored. I'll show them how a gigas deals with foolhardiness!
103111060.evoFlair_: It's not like I haven't learned a thing or two over the centuries. Don't be thinking it'll be easy to trespass in these woods!

117111030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Draw a card.
----------
Storm.
When you play a card using its Accelerate effect, evolve this follower.
117111030.baseFlair_:
I got eyes on the quarry! Geez, it's fast! But a pup like that is no match for me!
—Hunter's Journal Entry
117111030.evoFlair_:
I chased after it in the darkness. Then it started... growing. Man, I screwed up bad. And now I might have to pay the price...
—Hunted's Journal Entry

101121110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: All enemy followers in play can't attack next turn if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
101121110.baseFlair_: This woodland god bears an entire forest on its back, and with a single roar it robs invaders of their will to fight. The peace is thereby restored.
101121110.evoFlair_: So massive is the beast that all one can do is tremble and quake in fear. To defy it would be to face the incredible wrath of nature itself.

102121040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand and change their costs to 0.
102121040.baseFlair_: We go forth now to destroy those who would see our forest burn! Dwellers of the forest, lend me your strength!
102121040.evoFlair_: No matter how infertile the soil, hope is a plant that always finds a way to sprout! Today, dwellers of the forest, we fight for hope!

104121040.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
104121040.baseFlair_: Devils! Ya got some brass to step foot in the city of dwarves. I'll dice up every last one of ya!
104121040.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
104121040.evoFlair_: This beard's m'pride and joy! And I swear on every strand that none of ya devils will get away. Now here's what a dwarf can do!

110131010.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Ward.
110131010.baseFlair_: So many sacrifices have been made. So many tears shed. I can't shoulder it all, but I can make sure it ends here. Yes—I swear it!
110131010.evoFlair_:
"Coordination will be key in this operation. Understood?"
"Don't be stupid, Bayle. I can handle this alone."
"I... I see. Ugh, I feel sick..."
—Bayle and Sarissa

112131010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn and deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the attack of this follower minus the defense of the enemy follower.
112131010.baseFlair_: It's almost like the heavy weight of metal is a problem of the past. We see this most with the warriors of the forest who have developed weapons for the practicalities of warfare. —Researcher's Report, Part 3
112131010.evoFlair_: You should leave the forest as quick as you can. The inhabitants are using their hunting weapons for battle. And if they've managed to create a powerful weapon for a skilled warrior, well, let's just say you wouldn't want to cross paths with them. —Forest Rumors, Part 3

117131020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can only Accelerate if an allied follower has evolved this turn.)
----------
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower. Then, if the selected follower had 5 defense or less before damage was dealt, evolve this follower.
117131020.baseFlair_: Ungh... Ungh, ungggh! Oh, excuse me. I was experiencing a bout of cuddle withdrawal. I guess this new look of mine isn't doing me any favors either...
117131020.evoEffect_: Once on each of the opponent's turns, when the opponent plays a follower, deal 10 damage to it.
117131020.evoFlair_: I don't mind if the animals drive me batty. But as for intruders, I must ask them to leave. Then I can turn my undivided attention back to the cuddles!

104141010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of shadows you have. Then change your number of shadows to 0.
104141010.baseFlair_: Hear me, you who perished while nobly defending our forest. Your names will live on. Blessings for the brave!
104141010.evoFlair_: The fate of life is to cycle, and your lives are no exception. I won't mourn our parting, for I know that we'll meet again in time.

113141010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Return 2 other allied cards to your hand. Summon X Okami. X equals the number of cards returned.
Whenever an allied Okami comes into play, give it Rush.
113141010.baseFlair_: Where he treads, the earth blooms; where he bays, there is life. This is how the forest began. He—the steward of the primal forest—is nothing less than the cycle of life and rebirth. —Elder Lore, "Forest Beginnings"
113141010.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever an allied Okami comes into play, give it Rush.
113141010.evoFlair_: The earth in time withered again, and his life in time ended. It was a new genesis for all. Even should the earth wilt, life and rebirth cycle for all eternity. —Elder Lore, "Forest Endings"

900141040.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if at least 6 allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, invoke this card.
900141040.baseFlair_: Life is a famished beast ravening for nourishment. That is why the law exists. The forest law supports life, like the sturdy trunk of a tree. You must understand that freedom is but a sweet poison.
900141040.evoFlair_: The law is as ivy, as thorns. It is troublesome to be bound by, painful to be stuck by. But if you are to live in this forest, it cannot be avoided. You must understand that freedom is but a sweet poison.

116141020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any other Machina cards were played this turn, gain Storm.
Strike: Deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of allied Machina followers in play.
116141020.baseFlair_: Spin the helix, and the dead hand of time will spin with it. The forest will know the coming changes, no matter how small or apparent. One more rotation toward progress, guided by my drill. Only I can bore through to tomorrow.
116141020.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of allied Machina followers in play.
116141020.evoFlair_: The land howls in agony, having been awoken by a fool trying to bore through its crust. Seas rise up, gales tear through trees, volcanoes send lava rushing onto the battlefield. The struggle between the earth and the drill has begun.

101134030.baseEffect_: Return all followers to the players' hands.
101134030.baseFlair_: Return to where you belong—to the one who gave you life.

101121100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
101121100.baseFlair_: A young giant was separated from his herd and raised in the grace of the great trees until one day he found he'd become the forest's watchman. He now carries a staff cut from his mother tree and pulverizes invaders with a single blow.
101121100.evoFlair_: Routed by the giant, the invaders roused a band of soldiers to counterattack. But the giant, a friend of the forest, was aided by enough animals to overcome the militia. With his trusted friends, the giant turned back the trespassers once more.

109121030.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Give -1/-0 to all enemy followers if Ambush is active for this follower.
109121030.baseFlair_: It was the soft crunch of a bear's footsteps. The hunter's practiced ears recognized it as he retreated into the shadows. A bear is to be left alone. That is, if it was a bear, of course.
109121030.evoFlair_: It certainly was the crunch of a bear's footsteps. However, its eyes gleam with the shrewdness of a bird of prey. Whether in the dead of night or light of day, those eyes astutely take their next target.

101131040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
101131040.baseFlair_: An ancient dragon who has stood guard over the forest since time immemorial. It has bestowed its love on the fairies so as to protect the harmony of the woods.
101131040.evoFlair_: The old dragon knows every twig and root of the forest, and it speaks the wisdom of the woods themselves. The fairies gather in the moonlight to hear its words.

101141030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Transform each Fairy in your hand into a Thorn Burst.
101141030.baseFlair_: See the roses blooming? The deep red petals beckon to you. Such an intoxicating color. Can the pulsing crimson within you resist? Even knowing the thorns will wound you, you still come. How sad you are.
101141030.evoFlair_: See us grow so beautifully, proud, and unhindered? We only want to be beautiful—and if you would mar us, expect no mercy. I'll teach you that you have no right to pluck a flower that grows only to be beautiful.

103141010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Forestcraft cards (excluding White Wolf of Eldwood) from your deck into your hand at the start of your next turn. Change its cost to 0.
103141010.baseFlair_: A lupine god referred to as the sage of the forest. This beast provided wisdom to an ancient dragon, which knew only how to rule tyrannically, and conveyed orders to protect the forest.
103141010.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Forestcraft cards (excluding White Wolf of Eldwood) from your deck into your hand at the start of your next turn. Change its cost to 0.
103141010.evoFlair_: A lupine god who confronts intruders from the outside world. Until the guardian dragon awakens, the wolf will lead the woodland forces against all who would disrupt the forest's harmony.

104141020.baseEffect_: Leader Strike: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 0.
104141020.baseFlair_: It suddenly appeared in the darkest depths of the forest and silently began its inexorable invasion of the surrounding land. The sounds of the trees fracturing and splintering before it were almost like screams.
104141020.evoEffect_: Leader Strike: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 0.
104141020.evoFlair_: From deep within its own insides, it dragged out a great and terrible spear. With a bellow that shook the trees to their very roots, it proclaimed the end of the forest.

703141010.baseEffect_: Leader Strike: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 0.
703141010.baseFlair_: It suddenly appeared in the darkest depths of the forest and silently began its inexorable invasion of the surrounding land. The sounds of the trees fracturing and splintering before it were almost like screams.
703141010.evoEffect_: Leader Strike: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 0.
703141010.evoFlair_: From deep within its own insides, it dragged out a great and terrible spear. With a bellow that shook the trees to their very roots, it proclaimed the end of the forest.

111141030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Hornet Warriors.
Whenever an allied Hornet Warrior attacks the enemy leader, put a Hornet Sting into your hand.
111141030.baseFlair_:
The hornet queen lounges on her throne, the power of ten thousand drones loosely grasped in her idle hands.
"Ah, I'm so bored. Can't I just dissolve it all?"
With but a twitch of those sticky fingers, she could end the world by sundown.
111141030.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Hornet Warrior attacks the enemy leader, put a Hornet Sting into your hand.
111141030.evoFlair_:
Sticky with nectar, the hornet queen sprawls over her throne and yawns.
"Ah, so sleepy... Maybe I'll dissolve the world tomorrow."
She sleeps, and the world sees another dawn.

112141030.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever an effect returns 1 or more cards to a player's hand, deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals 2 times the number of cards that left play. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
112141030.baseFlair_: Contained within the Vajano Marsh is a murky pool, as fetid as it is deep. Below the surface of this abyss is where the mad lord of the forest resides. Those who enter his waters become his playthings, and whether they walk away or drown, it's purely his whim.
112141030.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Evolve: Return an enemy follower to the opponent's hand.
112141030.evoFlair_: When did his reign begin, and how long will it last? A lord lost forever to isolation, he searches for a companion. If he should ever hear the telltale signs of a plaything escaping beyond his grasp, the resulting howl would rattle the surrounding woodlands.

115141010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand. Put a 7-play point Lymaga, Forest Champion (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if at least 6 allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, invoke this card.
115141010.baseFlair_: Life is a famished beast ravening for nourishment. That is why the law exists. The forest law supports life, like the sturdy trunk of a tree. You must understand that freedom is but a sweet poison.
115141010.evoFlair_: The law is as ivy, as thorns. It is troublesome to be bound by, painful to be stuck by. But if you are to live in this forest, it cannot be avoided. You must understand that freedom is but a sweet poison.

109141030.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if at least 7 cards were played this turn, gain +7/+7. (This follower must be in your hand for this effect to activate.)
----------
Storm.
109141030.baseFlair_:
The forest is merciful and amiable—its generosity welcomes all forms of life. However, sometimes such kindness takes after foolishness.
—Stolen Verdant, Chapter 3
109141030.evoFlair_:
It is ruthless without mercy—a hateful being despising all forms of life. From the virtuous to the foolish, it devours all.
—Stolen Verdant, Chapter 10

114141030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Restore 4 defense to your leader.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly summon copies of allied Forestcraft followers of different costs (excluding Primal Giant) destroyed during this match until your area is full.
When this follower leaves play, randomly summon copies of allied Forestcraft followers of different costs (excluding Primal Giant) destroyed during this match until your area is full. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
114141030.baseFlair_:
A flower blooms, wilts, and, given enough time, sprouts anew. Why? Because the earth remembers that flower. So we, too, are born, die, travel through the memories of the earth, and are reborn.
—Oral Traditions of the Forest
114141030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
When this follower leaves play, randomly summon copies of allied Forestcraft followers of different costs (excluding Primal Giant) destroyed during this match until your area is full. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
114141030.evoFlair_: Scouts and monsters thought to be dead returned as an attacking mob. I remain unaware of the cause or mechanism of their return, a failure in my research. But I am calling off this experiment. That forest ... is too unsettling. —Research notes regarding a certain forest

101134020.baseEffect_: Draw a card. Then deal X damage to an enemy. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
101134020.baseFlair_: Go, my silver; cleanse this green land of evil.

106141020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Return all other allied followers to your hand. Then, gain +1/+1 for each card in your hand.
Ignore Ward.
106141020.baseFlair_: Those who possess language bring forth something from nothing. Through conversation, negotiation, and resolution, the something is given a name. However those who do not possess language return the something to nothing through howling, mauling, and destroying.
106141020.evoFlair_: Humans are animals that developed through language. They are therefore powerless against those who cannot speak. This creature's roars burst eardrums, and his assault rends flesh. Man can do nothing but fear the coming of nature's purge.

110141010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the enemy leader's maximum defense to 6.
110141010.baseFlair_: I have led a life unwithering—burgeoning, as it were. This way of being is the core of existence. Therefore fear not ruin; one must merely endure eternity. Now, shall we put the world to trial?
110141010.evoFlair_: Pass through the gates of heaven or plunge into the abyss of hell, you will suffer. Your tears will burn your cheeks; your screams will rend your throat. The world will continue, tormented by eternity and cursed with perpetuity. Now, shall we put the world to trial?

116141010.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if at least 4 cards were played this turn, subtract 4 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, destroy 4 random enemy followers.
116141010.baseFlair_: Only the forest folk realize the land is asleep. But there's no soul, not even one connected to nature, who can predict what will happen when it awakens.
116141010.evoFlair_:
To reject progress, to refuse change... It's akin to death. I will pierce through anything that aims to obstruct advancement. Whether that seems blasphemous or reckless, I care not—it's all the same to my drill.
—Damian, Drillarm Brawler
